thread.title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil suggests he will not face Sutton | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil suggests he will not face Sutton | Daily Mail Online

author: Alex Martin For Mailonline
title: Arsenal star Mesut Ozil suggests he will not face Sutton | Daily Mail Online
text: Share this article Share While Wenger has faced calls from a growing number of Arsenal fans to drop Ozil, it is more likely that the struggling playmaker has been given time off ahead of what will be a tough Premier League run-in. Arsenal have a welcomed week off thanks to Southampton's appearance in the EFL Cup final against Manchester United, meaning Sutton will be their last game until March 4, when they travel to Liverpool in a top four clash. Earlier in the day, Ozil revealed he was training at Arsenal's London Colney The Gunners looked jaded in the 5-1 defeat to Bayern Munich but none more so that Ozil, who appeared to succumb to the weight of pressure placed on his shoulders. Indeed, Arsenal's record signing has even come under scrutiny from his own team-mates, with factions of the dressing room believing that he is receiving preferential treatment from Wenger. Ozil has retained his place in the starting XI and has not even been substituted despite struggling to influence fixtures against Watford, Chelsea, Hull and the aforementioned Bayern Munich. 'I don't know - it can happen,' Wenger recently said, when asked if he knew why Ozil had been under performing. I don't know any specific reason. I had a chat with him [on Friday].' Mesut Ozil struggled to influence proceedings as Arsenal were thrashed by Bayern Munich RELATED ARTICLES
